alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:47AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa through 130 AM CDT... At 1246 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated weather stations were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Rushford to near Lime Springs. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Automated weather stations IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spring Grove around 105 AM CDT. Ridgeway around 120 AM CDT. Calmar, New Albin and Spillville around 130 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Hanover, Choice, Hesper, Nordness, Highlandville, Lake Meyer County Park, Quandahl, Riceford, County 5 And Peyton Road and Bluffton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
